document_data.caption: A typical round knife.
document_data.name: Round Knife
document_data.mainbody: '''Round knives''' were a type of leatherworking tool, resembling an oddly-shaped [[knife]].
document_data.Description:
[[File:Ornate Round Knife.png|thumb|''An ornate round knife.'']]
Round knives had a large crescent or half-moon shaped blade with a cutting edge along the entire curve. This allowed it to cut through leather at various angles.
